Search for Flights
For
Passengers
{{flight.airline}}
{{flight.remainingNumberOfSeats}} remaining seats
{{flight.departure?.place}}
{{flight.departure?.time | date }}
{{flight.departure?.time | date:'shortTime' }}
{{flight.price}}
{{flight.arrival?.place}}
{{flight.arrival?.time | date }}
{{flight.arrival?.time | date:'shortTime' }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FlightsService} from './../api/services/flights.service'; import { FlightRm } from '../api/models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent { searchFlights: FlightRm[] = [] constructor(private flightsService: FlightsService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } search() { this.flightsService.flightsGet({}) .subscribe(r => this.searchFlights = r ) } }
